p: The essential oils from S. botocudorum and S .tupiniquinorum were cytotoxic to lettuce meristematic cells. A reduction in MI and an increase in CA and NA were observed (Fig.Â 3a, b). The MI of cells treated with the essential oil from S. botocudorum was more affected than by glyphosate. The oil from S. tupiniquinorum also acted similarly to glyphosate for MI. As for the chromosomal changes, an increase was observed according to the oil concentration, nearing the positive control at the lowest concentrations and being more toxic at higher concentrations. Nuclear and micronuclear alterations were more expressive in the treatments with essential oil from S. tupiniquinorum, although they were different from the positive control.
